thread.section_title: Mybadges.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mybadges.com | mybadges.com
thread.title: Tracey Riach

author: Tracey Riach
title: Tracey Riach
text: I was looking online for name badge solutions and was delighted to find a company that had everything I needed for a great price. The customer service is really great and I was very pleased with the quick shipping and high quality products. I was also glad that they are located in Canada so I didn't have to worry about converting from US funds or having extra shipping or customs charges!
